articles.title: Massive Black Myth Wukong Update Is Going Live Today, Introducing Performance Optimizations - Wccftech
articles.description: A new Black Myth Wukong patch is launching today, introducing performance optimizations. The patch size, however, will be massive on PS5.

articles.description: Whether it’s a parent restricting a child’s access to social media or a young adult avoiding doom scrolling, a new generation of landlines is trending.

articles.title: New Rules Could Force Tesla to Redesign Its Door Handles. That’s Harder Than It Sounds - WIRED
articles.description: Proposed regulations in China would mean the end of flush handles on car doors, with precious little time to roll out the changes.

articles.title: Microsoft Locks Down IE Mode After Hackers Turned Legacy Feature Into Backdoor - The Hacker News
articles.description: Microsoft restricts IE Mode in Edge after threat actors exploited Chakra engine flaws for remote access.
